Text:

Well,actually it's not.I knew that last uploaded week was 46,but everybody ignored one week where DC only published one title:Justice league,and that officialy was also new 52 week,so this is the right week numbering-trust me.

I think someone did it last week, also the "Marvel I like" torrent usually has the good releases (though i didnt see it this week), but if thats not enough maybe u should start the "marvel bulk" each week, i think MrDowntown has a link on his torrents that teach you how to make and upload torrents
Thanks Mirrormaster, very much appreciated.

Thanks as always. I have look all over and can't seen to find anyone who has recent Spawn comics. I have from 1 - 215 or something but recently the uploads have stopped. Do you or Ichiroyoung know of anyone who still uploads Spawn? Thanks again.
Thanks dude! you rule!

So can someone clear up this numbering confusion for me?

Just created this account to thank mm82 and Ichiroyoung for all these releases. been enjoying them each week. :)

I want to thank Ichrio, Mirror, Cryptoc and who ever else has helped get all of these comics up for everyone to enjoy!  Thanks a lot guys! Your'e great!
